forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 63F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 11C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 63F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
